title: I want t delete my account please
body: I want to delete my account but NA League of legends has hard system to delete account. I want to delete my account. I already send twice a mail but I never apporved. Please delete my account please.  Character name is ILoveroh

replies.body: Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can look into this request.  We can't delete an account without absolute certainty that it's by the account owner.  We'll reply as soon as we can!
I am account owner and I have absolute certainty. Just delete please. I can give personal information if you want
